sn41.5:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā kāmabhū macchikāsaṇḍe viharati ambāṭakavane.
sn41.5:4.2: Atha kho citto gahapati yenāyasmā kāmabhū tenupasaṅkami;
sn41.5:4.3: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ kāmabhuṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
sn41.5:4.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinnaṃ kho cittaṃ gahapatiṃ āyasmā kāmabhū etadavoca:
sn41.5:6.1: * ‘Nelaṅgo setapacchādo,
sn41.5:6.3: Anīghaṃ passa āyantaṃ,
sn41.5:7.1: Imassa nu kho, gahapati, saṅkhittena bhāsitassa kathaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
sn41.5:7.2: “Kiṃ nu kho etaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā bhāsitan”ti?
sn41.5:7.4: “Tena hi, bhante, muhuttaṃ āgamehi yāvassa atthaṃ pekkhāmī”ti.
sn41.5:7.5: Atha kho citto gahapati muhuttaṃ tuṇhī hutvā āyasmantaṃ kāmabhuṃ etadavoca:
sn41.5:8.5: ‘Ratho’ti kho, bhante, imassetaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa adhivacanaṃ mātāpettikasambhavassa odanakummāsūpacayassa aniccucchādanaparimaddanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammassa.
sn41.5:8.6: Rāgo kho, bhante, nīgho, doso nīgho, moho nīgho.
sn41.5:8.7: Te khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn41.5:8.11: Sā khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn41.5:8.13: Rāgo kho, bhante, bandhanaṃ, doso bandhanaṃ, moho bandhanaṃ.
sn41.5:8.14: Te khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā.
sn41.5:8.16: Iti kho, bhante, yaṃ taṃ bhagavatā vuttaṃ:
sn41.5:10.1: Imassa kho, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn41.5:10.3: Yassa te gambhīre buddhavacane paññācakkhu kamatī”ti.
